abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews Howard Ashman and Alan Menken musical Kurt Vonnegut's God Bless You, Mr Rosewater, directed by Michael Mayer and starring James Earl Jones and Santino Fontana, as part of Encores! Off-Center summer season at City Center.
lead_paragraph: Encores! revives the 1979 musical “Kurt Vonnegut’s God Bless You, Mr. Rosewater,” a convoluted road trip that sends up capitalism.

headline.main: Review: A Vonnegut Madman Tangled in Thickets of Dark Satire
headline.print_headline: A Madman Tangled in Thickets of Dark Satire
